languages.text: Объявив Даргонус центром обороны Простора Коронус, Вольный Торговец сможет реквизировать чужие суда и собирать дополнительные ресурсы с населения.
By declaring Dargonus the defence centre of the Koronus Expanse, the Rogue Trader will be able to requisition foreign vessels and collect additional resources from the population.
languages.original_text: Объявив Даргонус центром обороны Простора Коронус, Вольный Торговец сможет реквизировать чужие суда и собирать дополнительные ресурсы с населения.

traits.locale_text: By declaring Dargonus the defence centre of the Koronus Expanse, the Rogue Trader will be able to requisition foreign vessels and collect additional resources from the population.
By declaring Dargonus the defence centre of the Koronus Expanse, the Rogue Trader will be able to requisition foreign vessels and collect additional resources from the population.
By declaring Dargonus the defence centre of the Koronus Expanse, the Rogue Trader will be able to requisition foreign vessels and collect additional resources from the population.
By declaring Dargonus the defence centre of the Koronus Expanse, the Rogue Trader will be able to requisition foreign vessels and collect additional resources from the population.
By declaring Dargonus the defence centre of the Koronus Expanse, the Rogue Trader will be able to requisition foreign vessels and collect additional resources from the population.

languages.text: En faisant de Dargonus le centre défensif des Étendues de Koronus, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pourra réquisitionner des vaisseaux étrangers et collecter des ressources supplémentaires auprès de la population.
languages.original_text: By declaring Dargonus the defence centre of the Koronus Expanse, the Rogue Trader will be able to requisition foreign vessels and collect additional resources from the population.

traits.locale_text: En faisant de Dargonus le centre défensif des Étendues de Koronus, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pourra réquisitionner des vaisseaux étrangers et collecter des ressources supplémentaires auprès de la population.

languages.text: ダルゴナスをコロヌス・エクスパンスの防衛拠点と宣言することで、自由開拓者は外国船を徴発し、住民から追加資源を徴収できるようになる。
languages.original_text: By declaring Dargonus the defence centre of the Koronus Expanse, the Rogue Trader will be able to requisition foreign vessels and collect additional resources from the population.

traits.locale_text: ダルゴナスをコロヌス・エクスパンスの防衛拠点と宣言することで、自由開拓者は外国船を徴発し、住民から追加資源を徴収できるようになる。

languages.text: 只要宣布达戈努斯成为科罗努斯扩区的防御中心，行商浪人就有权征召外国舰船，征收额外资源。
languages.original_text: By declaring Dargonus the defence centre of the Koronus Expanse, the Rogue Trader will be able to requisition foreign vessels and collect additional resources from the population.

traits.locale_text: 只要宣布达戈努斯成为科罗努斯扩区的防御中心，行商浪人就有权征召外国舰船，征收额外资源。

languages.text: Al declarar Dargonus centro de defensa de la Extensión de Koronus, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente podrá requisar naves extranjeras y recaudar recursos adicionales de la población.
languages.original_text: By declaring Dargonus the defence centre of the Koronus Expanse, the Rogue Trader will be able to requisition foreign vessels and collect additional resources from the population.

traits.locale_text: Al declarar Dargonus centro de defensa de la Extensión de Koronus, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente podrá requisar naves extranjeras y recaudar recursos adicionales de la población.

languages.text: Indem Dargonus zum Verteidigungszentrum der Koronus-Ausdehnung erklärt wird, kann {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ausländische Schiffe requirieren und zusätzliche Ressourcen von der Bevölkerung einsammeln.
languages.original_text: By declaring Dargonus the defence centre of the Koronus Expanse, the Rogue Trader will be able to requisition foreign vessels and collect additional resources from the population.

traits.locale_text: Indem Dargonus zum Verteidigungszentrum der Koronus-Ausdehnung erklärt wird, kann {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ausländische Schiffe requirieren und zusätzliche Ressourcen von der Bevölkerung einsammeln.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, Dargonus'u Koronus Enginliği'nin muhafaza merkezi ilan ederek yabancı gemilere el koyma ve nüfustan ilave kaynaklar talep etme imkânına sahip olacak.
languages.original_text: By declaring Dargonus the defence centre of the Koronus Expanse, the Rogue Trader will be able to requisition foreign vessels and collect additional resources from the population.
